scripts.setup: yarn && yarn clean:lib && lerna bootstrap && yarn setup:all
scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p node_modules/@types/prebid.js && cp examples/prebid/prebidjs.d.ts node_modules/@types/prebid.js/index.d.ts && yarn workspace @highfivve/ad-tag codeGen && yarn workspace @highfivve/ad-tag make:nodemodule
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules ad-tag/node_modules modules/**/node_modules moli-release/node_modules moli-debugger/node_modules
scripts.github:publish: yarn lerna run make:nodemodule && yarn lerna publish from-package --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/
